Title: Provides an exemption from suspension of driver's license for persons serving on fulltime active military duty
Summary: Provides exemption from suspension of a driver's license for persons serving fulltime active military duty who fail to pay fines from traffic or parking violations.
LawCode: Amd ยง1806-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to providing an exemption from suspension of a driver's license for persons serving on fulltime active military duty
